text: Giacomo D'Apollonio (born 25 April 1951 in Isernia) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the right-wing party Brothers of Italy. He was elected Mayor of Isernia on 19 June 2016 and took his office on 24 June. He is brigadier general on leave of the Guardia di Finanza. ==References== ==See also== *2016 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Isernia ==External links== * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Isernia Category:Brothers of Italy politicians
title: Giacomo D'Apollonio
